sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; export default function BottomRight(props) { let [forecast, setForecast] = useState("null"); function displayForecast(response) { setForecast(response.data.daily); } let apiUrl = `https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/onecall?lat=${props.coord.lat}&lon=${props.coord.lon}&appid=9a3b65ea12488fdd227f03eda47a0bf6&units=metric`; axios.get(apiUrl).then(displayForecast); return (

33°C

Monday

31°C

Tuesday

33°C

Wednesday

33°C

Thursday

33°C

Friday

); }
